petNameAdd:
1) STATE OF ASSAM
    Advocate - Tapan Kumar Bhattacharya

business_details.Business: Accused Sah Ali @ Sahar Ali is present. Heard argument for both sides.Later on, Judgment is delivered in the open court. The prosecution has failed to prove its case u/s 6 of POCSO Act against the accused beyond all reasonable doubt.Held, the accused is not guilty u/s 6 of POCSO Act.Accordingly, the accused is acquitted and set at liberty.The bail bond stands cancelled and the bailor is discharged from all liabilities.The case is disposed of.
